articles.title: South Africa's Shamsi hits out at 'ridiculous' T20 World Cup critics - Hindustan Times
articles.description: South Africa's Shamsi hits out at 'ridiculous' T20 World Cup critics | Crickit
articles.content:
South Africa leg-spinner Tabraiz Shamsi lambasted his team's "ridiculous" critics after the Proteas won another T20 World Cup nail-biter to reach the semi-finals.

articles.description: According to the CDC African sleeping sickness is caused by a parasite; people can get infected when bitten by a tsetse fly. TheHealthSite.com
articles.content:
Tsetse flies are said to be attracted to the motion and dust from moving vehicles. (Photo: Wikimedia Commons)
